description:
A dueling version of http://anidb.net/ch104744 [Hiroto]`s machine formed by docking the http://anidb.net/ch135856 [Core Gundam II Plus] with the Pluto Armor. This is the ninth Gundam of the Planets System. Based on the idea of Ecopla, which uses recycled materials, it employs "EP Armor" which redirects the kinetic energy produced by the machine into its interior.
Source: Official page
name: PFF-X7II+/P9 Plutine Gundam
